info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 27 at 11:42PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Fisher County through 1215 AM CDT... At 1141 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hudd, or 11 miles northwest of Hobbs, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rotan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for west central Texas.
